_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Causes and conditions for not knowing an: The heart is overcome and mired in sensual desire
The heart is overcome and mired in ill will
The heart is overcome and mired in dullness and drowsiness
The heart is overcome and mired in restlessness and remorse
The heart is overcome and mired in doubt
Causes and conditions for knowing and se: A mendicant develops the awakening factor of mindfulness
A mendicant develops the awakening factor of investigation of principles
A mendicant develops the awakening factor of energy
A mendicant develops the awakening factor of rapture
A mendicant develops the awakening factor of tranquility
A mendicant develops the awakening factor of immersion
A mendicant develops the awakening factor of equanimity
